text: Club de Fútbol Leones Negros de la Universidad de Guadalajara, mostly known as Leones Negros, is a football club that currently plays in the Ascenso MX == Honours == === National === *Ascenso MX: 1 ::Apertura 2013 *Copa México: 1 ::1990-91 *Primera División: 0 ::Runner-up (3): 1975-76, 1976-77, 1989-90 *Segunda División: 1 ::1996-97 ::Runner-up (1): Apertura 2005 === International === *CONCACAF Champions' Cup: 1 ::1978 Category:Mexican football clubs Category:Guadalajara Category:1970 establishments in North America Category:1970s establishments in Mexico
title: Leones Negros UdeG
